content.question: The work shown was intended to elicit a humorous response from viewers by

choices.label: placing a common object in an unexpected context
presenting an old piece of military equipment as artwork
using both modern and preindustrial materials

content.answer: placing a common object in an unexpected context

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
